page.title: 09SPECIAL SCHOOL
page.content: There are several schools in the area and one of the most interesting is Fernbank Special School.This is a school for mentally handicapped children.Age range 21/2 to 19 years.Aim is to educate as well as care for children.Staff-30 plus voluntary help.Special feature-hot water swimming pool to relax the children.In a limited way the children learn to read and write key words, play organised games,make music etc. At older age children move on to Adult Training Centre. Here they perform simple tasks such as making Christmas crackers, packing goods for firms, growing and selling plants plus suitable work out in the community.This work earns about 3 pound per week pocket money.A stimulating and pleasant environment for handicapped children.
